name: Slime Island (AtomicAnt)
description:
How to play:

Swing your hands around to hit trees, bushes, and slimes with your mouse!

Destroying a bush gives you food, destroying a tree will give you wood!

Defeat slimes for points, and eat food to survive!

Credits:

Thank you karelessocelot for the music, cover image, and title screen!

Also used Grass Tileset and some of playerSprites_!
